text: Vincent Gil (1939 â€“ 21 August 2022), also known as Vince Gil, was an Australian actor. He was best known for his role as Nightrider in the 1979 movie Mad Max, and Stone. He also had roles in the television series Neighbours and Prisoner. He was born in Sydney, Australia. Gil died on 21 August 2022 at the age of 83.Legendary Aussie Mad Max star Vincent Gil dies aged 83 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian stage actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Actors from Sydney
